p: Location: 100% Remote, or locations in Carmel, Indiana; Eagan, MN; Little Rock, Arkansas
p.2: Do you enjoy developing software solutions focused on the management and exchange of data? Do you have experience developing APIs, messaging, and/or events? If so, we=E2=80=99d like to know about you! MISO is hiring a Software Developer / Software Engineer to take MISO to the next level on how we manage and share data across this very rich, data-driven organization.
p.4: This position is critical to progressing MISO=E2=80=99s data strategy. Be a part of implementing new data integration services which will improve data availability, performance, security, and quality of our applications! You will build services, APIs, messages, and events, work with other teams to build their services, and implement forward-thinking designs for future business needs.
p.6: You=E2=80=99ll need the following skills to be successful in this Software Developer / Software Engineer role:

li: Java programming is a =E2=80=9Cmust-have=E2=80=9D (Kotlin and Python could be beneficial too)
li.1: Understanding and experience building data integrations, ideally using APIs and Event/Messaging Platforms like Kafka
li.2: Understanding the concepts and benefits of Event-Driven Architecture
li.3: Knowledge around distributed systems, Kubernetes, and/or cloud-based solutions
li.5: Familiar with Oracle, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server
li.6: Bachelor=E2=80=99s or Master=E2=80=99s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related technical field

p.7: If you=E2=80=99re a life-long learner, independent thinker, and you=E2=80=99re looking for an opportunity to contribute to MISO=E2=80=99s data strategy, please apply!
p.9: MISO manages the electricity superhighway in the Central U.S. Through use of groundbreaking research and advanced technology, our highly skilled employees ensure power flows reliably to 42 million Americans. Operating the electricity grid, running a robust energy market, planning for a bright future =E2=80=93 it=E2=80=99s what our immensely talented and dedicated team does every day.
p.11: MISO has adapted our recruiting and onboarding processes to accommodate the needs of our prospective employees. We are committed to the health and safety of our employees while maintaining a reliable bulk electric system and are proud to offer #workfromhome options to our employees. MISO offers a comprehensive benefits package available on your first day of employment. #hiring
